imdb.plot outline: Why did Ning Nong the Thai elephant bother to bring a young girl to higher grounds when he sensed a tsunami? Why did a group of Australian dolphins decide to protect a swimming family against a looming shark attack? An international investigation team of young researchers tries to get to the bottom of incredible but true rescue stories like these. They are online friends from different countries who share a passion for funny animal films, extraordinary animal facts and remarkable acts of animal heroism. Together, they try to figure out what makes an animal a hero.
imdb.title: Heroes with a Tail: The Animal Detectives
akas: Heroes with a Tail: The Animal Detectives (Netherlands)
